channel.title: In My Opinion on Solidforest
channel.description: Recent content in In My Opinion on Solidforest

item.title: 1 Fight 2 Flight
item.description: Maybe some of you like me have experienced situations where we met or made certain options in dealing with a problem. For example, personal problems may be relationships with partners, family problems, finances, work drama (in the office) or even more severe problems with the state, politics and the military. Basically the problems we face will lead us to choices to find solutions and resolutions. The severity of the problem and the available opportunities will affect the possible number of choices that can be made.

item.title: Thought About Music and Musicians
item.description: Sarah, who had to give up her dream of becoming a professional musician to live her dream of being an independent musician, has been dreaming of this dream for a long time, it all started when she was little, and she always wanted to play music but she always thought she couldn’t do it. She started to learn how to play instruments at the age of 7, and then she started to make music. After a while she found her passion in the field of music, but she couldn’t believe in herself. So, she decided to try and make her dreams come true.
